roleset.name: pillaging
roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT, loot-v.01.

example.name: MNR
example.text: Twitter is going mental with reports of bomb threats , mass looting , fires etc .

example.name: Args 0 and 1
example.text: They brag over their looting of a grave, and removal of an almost 100 year old skeleton.
example.note: This assumes that the skeleton is what was stolen. If it was jewelery or something that was stolen from the skeleton, then skeleton would be arg2.
example.arg: of an almost 100 year old skeleton

example.name: Args 0 and 2
example.text: We do not want to wake up in 2013 and blame ourselves that we remained silent for the NPP to sneak back again to continue their looting of this country.
